caption: cyRespond to a property possession claim
pageTitle: cyTenancy, occupation contract or licence start date
question: cyWhen did your tenancy, occupation contract or licence start (optional)?
paragraph: cy{{claimantName}} did not provide the start date of your tenancy, occupation contract or licence.

date.required: cyYour tenancy start date must include a day, month and year
date.notRealDate: cyTenancy start date must be a real date
date.futureDate: cyTenancy start date must be in the past

date.missingTwo: cyYour tenancy start date must include a {{first}} and {{second}}
